website_summaries.verdict: The perfect size and shape to shade your patio table and chairs: up to six people can sit comfortably underneath. Solar LED lights on each rib add a pretty touch to outdoor entertaining. An all-around great choice for your patio.
pros: Fade resistant, super durable polyester umbrella with strong powdered aluminum frame
Push button tilt and crank make it easy to adjust the umbrella just the way you need it
Vented top for use on breezy days
cons: The lights are relatively small, so they will not illuminate your space completely

customer_reviews.title: Buy this excellent deck umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased less expensive deck umbrella for our wrap-around deck. These very inferior products cost about $10 less than this deck umbrella and they were damaged in just a month or two. This 5 Star is of very high quality, is of durable beautiful fabric and does NOT blow down easily. If that is not enough, there are very pretty lights that work reliably and make it fun for late night card games. I bought one for our front deck and 2 days later bought a 2nd for the back deck. They held up all summer to drenching rains, sudden windy conditions and did NOT fade! Excellent product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M

customer_reviews.title: Lights are much better than expected and do last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Very well made umbrella. Not sure why the comments about breeze, we live in Florida and have high winds and I have had no issues even while the umbrella is open. Lights are much better than expected and do last a long time. Left on overnight and they were still on in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy Regan

customer_reviews.title: good value. Good looks. Fabric fades though
customer_reviews.text: very good looks and quality for the price. Not too strong though... but for the price, it is a very good buy in my opinion. UPDATE (Mar, 2020): fabric fades very bad. Two summers in southern california and looks like this. Waste of landfill space with perfectly fine structure. Abba should sell replacement tops. I would pay, say, 50%, for longer lifespan
customer_reviews.author: Agus

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied. The rectangle shape fits perfectly over our rectangle ...
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied. The rectangle shape fits perfectly over our rectangle patio dining set providing shade for most people at the table. The square solar panel at the top is removable if you don't want the lights. I have not been able to find an umbrella cover that will fit over the top solar device since it's wider than the tip of the umbrella. Not a huge problem, I just like to cover the umbrella when not in use . The fabric is thinner than I had imagined but definitely gets the job done of providing shade.
customer_reviews.author: MNMOUNTAINMAN

customer_reviews.title: Run broke
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd umbrella I have bought from this seller and I love them. However the umbrella I received about a month ago broke this week and I was going to return it but we took it down and laid it on our yard and someone took it!!! So I need another one!!! One of the ribs broke right where a light was attached. Yes I am unhappy about that.
customer_reviews.author: RITA LORY

customer_reviews.title: Frame bending
customer_reviews.text: I would give 3.5. One of the arms is already bending which cracked one of the lights, which I’m not sure how that even happened because I was careful with it. The red color is closer to dark red wine color, which is fine bought thought it would be closer in color to the sample used in the add. I do like the crank and tilting option. I like that the switch for the lights is on the base where the crank is located.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone comments about how nice this umbrella is
customer_reviews.text: Everyone comments about how nice this umbrella is. I was shocked how long the lights last at night. I have left it out to charge during the day and the lights were still working when the sun came up the next day. .
customer_reviews.author: Matt NY

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: Finally I got to set up the umbrella after receiving my new patio furniture. all my home repairs from Hurricane Michael completed and this was the last thing to do so I could enjoy the sunny warm weather we are getting here lately. set up was easy... 3 days after I installed the umbrella I come home to find out one of the "ribs" completely broken. How did it happened I have no clue... all others are perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great company!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the umbrella, it was easy to put together and just as described. Unfortunately not too long after I had it it broke due to some wind. I contacted ABBA and they replaced it with a brand new one. The company stands behind their product. Very happy with their customer service! Do buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very sturdy with the base full of sand & water. Filling the base takes 10x as long as the umbrella set up. I did most of the set up alone with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome umbrella but buy a heavy base.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Buy a HEAVY base. 30lbs won't hold it at all. 60+ IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Junior1773

customer_reviews.title: We love this! Lots of lights that are already installed ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Lots of lights that are already installed on the underside of the umbrella. Super easy to install. Just plug in the solar panel on top and twist and then screw top pole into lower pole and you're done!! Does not come with base (we already had one). And, the lights came on as soon as we put it up!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella has no straps to tie around it when not in use or during high wind. I had to use a bunge chord. Even cheap patio umbrellas have straps for tie around the umbrella. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Price Point.
customer_reviews.text: It's Fine. The Color is Dark Red...not as bright of a red as shown on my computer screen?! It covers our rectangular wood picnic table ( which has an umbrella insert ) well. The solar led lights do work. For the $...it will do! We stored it inside during a strong windy day...
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Eve

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I used this umbrella for one season, took good care of it, but the mechanism that controls the tilt crapped on us. We never even used the tilt feature but it broke anyway. Obviously cheaply made. Bummer cause it was a nice looking umbrella, but totally disappointed and annoyed 👎
customer_reviews.author: one love nbgny

customer_reviews.title: Lots of value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive. Solar lights on vanes a plus. Do take down in heavy wind. I didn’t and thus bought a replacement but bought same one a second time. It was my neglect. As we had big spring winds.
customer_reviews.author: pamela A Wilford

customer_reviews.title: Lights quit working
customer_reviews.text: This is very pretty, bought it last summer. But this year, the lights won't come on at all now. I'm so disappointed. I pulled the solar panel off to see if it takes batteries then checked this site, and figured it doesn't take batteries - so what happened to it? I miss the little lights so much, I don't know how to repair it? I emailed the company for help and never got a response. I wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Nice that no one returned it
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. Very strong. I bought this after our old umbrella blew away in a wind storm. Nice that no one returned it, but I digress. THe lights are a bonus. We couldn't wait to eat dinner outside after the sun went down. It has a good ambiance of light, but if you want to see thigs clearly, you'll need to add a lamp. :)
customer_reviews.author: MyahBee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover for outdoor dining in Phoenix area. LED lighting bright enough to play cards at night. Only critique is umbrella post tends to turn (unscrew) in breeze. Would be nice to have way to “lock” the threaded joint after assembly (pin or set screw maybe?)
customer_reviews.author: Harpo

customer_reviews.title: Weak structure - arns fractured
customer_reviews.text: Loved this umbrella during first few months. But after a few windy days, two of the arms are fracturing. Going to buy something better for a few more bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Good value and product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to work very well. It is very large and covers my rectangular table. All of my lights worked right out of the box. Seems to be constructed well. I’ve used it for five times now and I don’t see any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rakun12

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: We needed shade on our back porch. I was considering installing an awning before I saw this. Decided to try this and it met our expectations. Like the built in LED lighting. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Clay

customer_reviews.title: In the shade
customer_reviews.text: Great product we love it more thAn we thought we would use it almost daily
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Piety

customer_reviews.title: We are pleased with the umbrella so far
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with the umbrella so far, love the color...just wish it had a way to tie it down when it's in the closed position...will have to figure out how to add that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Stark

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My umbrella is totally missing half of the post. I have half of an umbrella. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, NOT WORTH $$
customer_reviews.text: Lights quit working within 2 months... We probably turned them a total of 3 times during that time frame?
customer_reviews.author: TSY

customer_reviews.title: The lights are so cool!
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella. Good quality, especially the lights. No need to take the protective cover off the light switch. Keeps it water proof. Hard to get back on. Thought is was packing, but it's a cover. Easy to use. Nice umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor wiring on lights.
customer_reviews.text: Received the umbrella today and right out of the box, one segment of lights didn’t work. Decided to look at the wiring under the solar panel and had to correct the poor wire done by manufacturer. One of the wires to the lights wasn’t even connected. After securing the wires better all lights work. Love the umbrella and would have given 5 starts if I didn’t have to fix it on day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All LED lights not working
customer_reviews.text: One strand of LED lights does not light. Poor QA control. this should have been checked before shipping to me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Nice big umbrella, great price. Only problem is that it spins when it's breezy. The included spacers don't prevent it. Wil end up having to drill a hole for the tightening screw. Nbd.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Swartz

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY UMBRELLA
customer_reviews.text: Like this umbrella. The shape is perfect for our table. Seems well made and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ACA327

customer_reviews.title: Lovely addition to our patio.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful umbrella which fit perfectly over our new table. Love the quality, color and the beautiful built in solar lights add to the night time ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super nice umbrella, very good quality for the price. Looks like $300 umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: mariusz sobanski

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, I got the red
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, I got the red. It brightens up my patio during the day and is just the right lightening at night.
customer_reviews.author: makugr8

customer_reviews.title: Very nice so far.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Lights are helpful. Seems to be sturdy. I bought this at the end of the summer so I’ll know more once it gets more use next summer, but for now I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Devilsone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Really love this umbrella the lights are perfect to light up any get together
customer_reviews.author: Tamara & Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVED the length and width...EXCEPT the solar lights are not working since the second week we had it

customer_reviews.title: but was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: got lots of compliments on this from my friends! had a wind storm a couple weeks after getting this and it's unusable at this point, but was great while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Main reason I also purchased this was for the Solar ...
customer_reviews.text: Main reason I also purchased this was for the Solar Lights. They never worked. Tried everything. Now the unfruitful task of re-packaging and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Pete L.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with a stand. But otherwise super nice having solar powered lights underneath the umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: We've gotten so many compliments on this umbrella with solar ...
customer_reviews.text: We've gotten so many compliments on this umbrella with solar lights. Just the right amount of light to dine at night. Does not attract insects!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love the umbrella but wanted the solar lights for extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Receive in timely manner however the solar lights will not work at all. Love the umbrella but wanted the solar lights for extra lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B Laney

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, easy to set up, tilt is nice, lights are cool, sturdy so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Janie Demetropoulos

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella, could not be happier. We had an issue with the lights not working, I contacted customer service and had a response in less than 24 hours. They shipped a replacement solar panel via FedEx immediately. Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Leach

customer_reviews.title: Great solar light umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is the second umbrella we ordered so we were familiar with the features already. Great shade coverage over our outdoor table and the solar lighting is perfect at night when entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic umbrella. The lights are so bright you can play cards under it at night! Sturdy and strong. Just don't leave it up in the wind though - like all umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Heffner

customer_reviews.title: Thin cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: After putting the umbrella together the fabric has holes in it. I’d never be able to repack this cheaply made item, so I’m stuck with an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: J Lemke

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with my purchase of the Abba Patio umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase of the Abba Patio umbrella. The umbrella has a solar panel built in to the umbrella pole which charged the solar lights. I love it! It's so bright that I don't need additional lighting, so no electric bill!
customer_reviews.author: Joan D

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It gives a large shade. The lights are not so bright but it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nandova24

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella and no issues so far
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised!! Great Umbrella and no issues so far. There is a switch to turn on/off solar lights, looks great!! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Lights broke within 6 mo
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months old lights broke. Bummer! Rest of umbrella seems nice but we needed the lights
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: beautiful umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I love the color red this is-so deep yet so summery-looks beautiful out by my pool
customer_reviews.author: Gina Formicola Bass

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the rectangular umbrella with solar lights and received a round umbrella with no solar lights
customer_reviews.author: kelly.dobin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but a bit Too big for my small patio. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Svita

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Solar lights work great
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Solar lights work great. Pleased with this product and the color.
customer_reviews.author: TERESA JASINSKI

customer_reviews.title: Reel broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in may and only 2 months after I started using it the reel no longer works. It is open and i can no longer close it. Otherwise I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: araceli vargas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but....
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong so take it down and store as soon as the slightest breeze is felt. Lights are great at night and it does provide a good amount of shade. This is our second one in a year. Both could not handle a breeze....not even a light breeze!
customer_reviews.author: dan ross

customer_reviews.title: Could not recommend this to anyone based on my experience..., Twice!
customer_reviews.text: Second Abba Patio I ordered that came damaged. I loved the quality of the umbrella, but the first umbrellas, the lights did not work, the second umbrella, the toggle switch was busted, pushed in and the plastic piece that covers it was busted laying inside the box. Very disappointed as I was really looking forward to this new addition on my patio. Instead, I have no umbrella. It did look really nice, but 2 damaged umbrellas from the same company, I'm done. Was going to purchase a $600 3 person swing from them, but I rethought that after this return.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great light strength. Easy assembly. A good addition to our patio
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: the abba umbrella is extremely well built and beautiful especially having the led lights
customer_reviews.text: when we had a light issue with first abba umbrella, we called amazon the problem was immediately resolved. there was not a hassle it went smoother that I imagined it would. the abba umbrella is extremely well built and beautiful especially having the led lights..with the quality of the umbrella it it definitely worth the money and I would buy another one before I looked any where else. amazon was awesome all the way! thank you so much for all your help., you guys are great!
customer_reviews.author: patrice bates

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrealla
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, one the lights worked great and the second one the lights never worked on.
customer_reviews.author: John Hinzo

customer_reviews.title: Bad item.
customer_reviews.text: the lights worked for a week and never worked again.Bad item.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: looks good. feels good. priced right. enough light to see what you're eating & set the mood, but not enough to read(don't want to anyway!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Carroll

customer_reviews.title: and easily assembled. Seems to be good
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, and easily assembled. Seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: I bought the suggested base and this umbrella blew over ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the suggested base and this umbrella blew over quite a few times and I don't live in a very windy area. Now it has blown over and the top part broke so I am unable to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase, the service and packaging were great. We have enjoyed the umbrella in these sweltering summer days in Virginia.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Having only had this product for a week but so far very pleased. Bought it in red and love the color. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Handbgqn

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with umbrella so far. Only minor issue was one light was out as soon as we opened it up and turned on the lights. Not a significant issue. Otherwise very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, color and the solar lights are just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella fits our table perfectly. The color is great and the lights add a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia C. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: I love this umbrella but the light switch doesn't work - ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella but the light switch doesn't work - the lights are always on and I am afraid they will burn out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth MacDonough

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant summer umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect umbrella for my cottage deck. Love the red color and solar lights! Provides just the right amount of shade for outside summer reading.
customer_reviews.author: mary mcneil

customer_reviews.title: This Umbrella fit our needs however the light switch seems ...
customer_reviews.text: This Umbrella fit our needs however the light switch seems faulty. The lights come on with turning on the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Leon

customer_reviews.title: NO WIND VENT!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful umbrella but no wind vent on top, 1 gust of wind carried it and smashed against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the umbrella but one of the stems was bent ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the umbrella but one of the stems was bent when we took it out of the box. Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT! The led solar lights lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT! The led solar lights lasted about a day. I purchased this because of the solar capability of the lights. This was an expensive purchase. When the lights failed, I contacted the company. I thought they were going to replace the umbrella for me, but instead sent me a ring of lights that mount on the center pole that need to be PLUGGED IN! Really?????? I purchased this product because of the solar capability... NOT HAVING TO PLUG IT IN! What a joke! Again, DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!!!!!! I DO NOT RECOMMEND PURCHASING THIS VERY DISAPPOINTING SOLAR PATIO UMBRELLA!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The LED's were a nice touch. Short of that
customer_reviews.text: The LED's were a nice touch. Short of that, color faded and was multicolored when you opened it. The umbrella met its fate a few weeks back, couple of wind gusts and two of the arms bent at the LED drill holes. Weak point in the design it looks like. I'll be honest I read reviews about them having this issue and was extra careful, even heard a crack of thunder about 2:30 in the morning and ran down and closed the umbrella in a heavy down pour storm. I was always worried about wind doing this and would close the umbrella if the wind did pick up, welp, no more of that. It's now in a landfill somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: The w8s

customer_reviews.title: A very nice umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella has met my expectations. A very nice umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: karl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and pretty lights!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our umbrella! It has a beautiful color and the built-in lights are pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lights are kinda fun, but they stay on all day too!
customer_reviews.author: PattyDelChico

customer_reviews.title: great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the umbrella. The lights work surprisingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen sandaker

customer_reviews.title: Broke on First Day
customer_reviews.text: Used the umbrella for the first time today in my patio table. It was a nice day - fair weather. There was a small gust of wind - maybe 10-15 mile per hour and the entire umbrellas folded in half and broke. So upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: K. Douma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful umbrellas- bought 3 for our yard quality is outstanding ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful umbrellas- bought 3 for our yard quality is outstanding and the lights under are solar powered and work beautifully! So pretty!
customer_reviews.author: nylongirl4

customer_reviews.title: Returned weak design
customer_reviews.text: One arm was bent at a drilled hole for one of the many led lights. Better to buy you own lights and just hang them so umbrella frame doesn't have a bunch of holes drilled in it.
customer_reviews.author: todd g

customer_reviews.title: This is very poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received the patio umbrella without the solar panel. I have made contact with ABBA Patio and the seller to receive a solar panel and to no avail. ABBA Patio responded informing me they do not have solar panels. I do not understand how that could be because they are the manufacture of this umbrella. This is very poor customer service, unable to the enjoy the lights on my umbrella as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and well worth the price! Thank you Abba Patio for my wonderful new umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: A Errico

customer_reviews.title: Don't Do It Dude.
customer_reviews.text: First mildly strong wind, with the umbrella collapsed down, and the pole bent. Significantly. Then tumbled into the pool. Thus ruining the solar panel and lights. We had only gotten to use it once. Horribly disappointed 😕
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great price & excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent umbrella, love the structure of it. We haven’t been able to set up yet due to cold weather. But it’s everything and more then expected.. definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Karen McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Love this patio umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in red. Adds drama & style to my patio while keeping the sun at bay. The LED lights work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Firnest

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really nice umbrella but the manufactured was very cheap. It's lacking a tie to secure the umbrella when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at great price
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have made for my house and the best value.
customer_reviews.author: RAMI EID

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Loved this umbrella. Color is true. I ordered red and it's a beautiful true red. The lights are fun and bright. Had family visiting and use the umbrella over a rectangular table. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

product_meta.title: Abba Patio Solar LED 9 x 7 ft Patio Offset Hanging Umbrella Cantilever Umbrella with Cross Base for Garden, Deck, Backyard, Pool, Dark Red
feature_bullets: Parasol easily opens and closes with crank lifting system, Auto tilt function easy to maximize shading area and against the sun

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars209 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
